spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout broadly resembles the 2D plan (bedroom left/top, living central-left, kitchen right, toilet near top-center), but several plan-defined subspaces and offsets are simplified. Wall jogs/indentations on the right/top (utility/duct region) are not faithfully reproduced, and key area proportions (foyer vs living vs kitchen) appear altered. Door and window positions partially match but not consistently.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness and general wall/door construction are consistent in the render, but the plan’s utility/duct organization is not preserved, breaking intended adjacencies (kitchen-to-utility relationship). Most rooms shown connect plausibly, yet at least one required room/zone is missing and some partitions appear reinterpreted.

furniture_mapping.notes: Major furniture pieces align with room intent (bed/wardrobe in bedroom; dining table in living/dining; kitchen counters/appliances). However, placement does not closely follow the 2D layout (e.g., living seating/TV arrangement and balcony interface), and some item scales/clearances look idealized rather than plan-true.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean isometric presentation with good readability and generally correct axonometric feel. Lighting and materials are coherent; geometry is mostly clean with minimal artifacts. Minor issues: some openings/frames look simplified and not strictly orthographic/plan-exact in proportions.

detected_errors.description: Utility area (3'9" wide) shown in the 2D plan is not clearly present as a separate space in the 3D render; kitchen/utility separation appears removed.
Duct/shaft adjacent to the toilet (labeled 'DUCT' in plan) is not represented as a distinct enclosure in the 3D model.
Foyer size/definition differs: the 2D plan shows a compact foyer (4'6" x 3'10"), while the 3D render depicts a larger/opener entry zone, shifting circulation area allocation.
Room proportion distortion: relative areas between living/dining, foyer, and kitchen appear rebalanced compared to the stated plan dimensions.
Window placement/scale mismatch: the kitchen/top-right window appears larger/differently positioned than the plan suggests; some plan windows/openings are simplified.
Door swing/orientation inconsistencies: several doors in the 3D render do not match the swing directions implied by the 2D plan (notably around toilet/bedroom/entry transitions).
Balcony interface differs: the balcony enclosure/entry framing in the 3D render does not clearly match the plan’s balcony layout and opening proportions.
Hallucinated/over-specified elements: added glazing/rail-like balcony treatment and some interior partition detailing that are not explicitly indicated in the 2D plan.
